EmailTemplate.name: VIC Gifting - Ready for pick up 2021
EmailTemplate.subject: ***Your Gift is on its way/Your Gift is ready for pick-up***
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
Perfect!
Looking forward to receiving you in-store on **visit date**. I will personally be here to welcome you. / Unfortunately, I will not be at the store on this day, however, my colleague XXX will be happy to assist you.
**tag sent**,
I hope you enjoy your next journeys with this unique travel tag.
Have a lovely day.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
